From: Gordon Mohr <gojomo@...>
Subject: Update re: Heritrix Expert Summit
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=137285340; y=J2y0LZSDpr_E47pRpMnwzLwAyhxo9qhjFG9s6HPrHsXr
X-Yahoo-Profile: gojomo

We're continuing to search for the best dates for a 3-day Heritrix 
Expert Summit in San Francisco, and are now considering dates in 
January-April of 2010 as well as October of 2009.

We'd like to let everyone help pick the period that enables the widest 
possible participation by advanced Heritrix crawl operators and developers.

If you are interested in attending, could you please fill out a small 
survey about possible dates, and be sure to include your contact info in 
the 'comment' field?

Select the three days upon which you would most like the meeting to fall 
and then one to two alternative sets of three days. We would like to 
start mid-day on day one, have a full day on day two and close with a 
half day on day three, if feasible for those traveling from abroad.

http://beta.meetomatic.com/respond.php?id=M583B9

PROPOSED MEETING DATES:
Monday 12th October 2009
Tuesday 13th October 2009
Wednesday 14th October 2009
